scripts.test: npm run test:clean && npx mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register 'tests/**/*.test.ts' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=test-report,json=true,html=true,inline=true,charts=true,code=true
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:clean && npx mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register 'tests/unit/**/*.test.ts' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=unit-report,json=true,html=true
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:clean && npx mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register 'tests/integration/**/*.test.ts' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=integration-report,json=true,html=true
scripts.test:smoke: npm run test:clean && npx mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register --grep '@smoke' 'tests/**/*.test.ts' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=smoke-report,json=true,html=true
